description.english: Defeat the final bosses without getting hit
description.german: Besiege die Endgegner, ohne getroffen zu werden.
description.french: Bats les boss sans te faire toucher.
description.italian: Sconfiggi i boss finali senza subire colpi
description.koreana: 한 대도 맞지 않고 최종 보스들을 처치한다

description.russian: Победить финальных боссов, не получив урона
description.japanese: ダメージを受けずにラスボスを倒す
description.dutch: Versla de eindbazen zonder dat je wordt geraakt
description.arabic: اهزم الزعماء النهائيين دون التعرض للإصابة
description.brazilian: Derrote os chefões finais sem sofrer dano

description.english: Find a hidden treasure
description.german: Finde einen versteckten Schatz.
description.french: Trouve un trésor caché.
description.italian: Trova un tesoro nascosto
description.spanish: Encuentra un tesoro oculto
description.russian: Найти тайное сокровище
description.japanese: 隠されたお宝を見つける
description.dutch: Vind een verborgen schat
description.brazilian: Encontre um tesouro escondido

displayName.japanese: 釣りをするほうがいい

description.english: Be nice to someone who's minding his own business
description.german: Sei nett zu jemandem, der sich um seinen eigenen Kram kümmert.
description.french: Laisse une personne inoffensive en paix.
description.italian: Sii gentile con qualcuno che pensa ai fatti suoi
description.koreana: 자기 할 일을 하는 자에게 친절하게 군다
description.spanish: Sé amable con alguien que esté ocupándose de sus asuntos
description.schinese: 对专心做事的人好一点
description.tchinese: 對專心做事的人好一點
description.russian: Хорошо отнестись к тому, кто занят своим делом
description.japanese: 他人の邪魔をしないようにする
description.dutch: Wees aardig tegen iemand die zich met zijn eigen zaakjes bemoeit
description.arabic: كن لطيفًا مع شخص يهتم بشؤونه الخاصة
description.brazilian: Seja gentil com alguém que está cuidando da própria vida

description.english: Take up the weapon of a defeated foe
description.german: Nimm die Waffe eines besiegten Gegners an dich.
description.french: Ramasse l'épée d'un ennemi vaincu.
description.italian: Raccogli l'arma di un nemico sconfitto
description.spanish: Coge el arma de un enemigo derrotado
description.russian: Взять оружие поверженного врага
description.japanese: 倒した敵の武器を頂く
description.dutch: Pak het wapen van een verslagen vijand
description.brazilian: Empunhe a arma de um adversário derrotado

description.english: Transport a heavy explosive
description.german: Transportiere schweren Sprengstoff.
description.french: Transporte un explosif très puissant.
description.italian: Trasporta un esplosivo pesante
description.spanish: Transporta un explosivo pesado
description.russian: Перевезти мощную взрывчатку
description.japanese: 爆発物を運ぶ
description.dutch: Vervoer een zwaar explosief
description.brazilian: Carregue um explosivo perigoso

description.english: Defeat a sturdy opponent in an unexpected way
description.german: Besiege einen robusten Gegner auf unterwartete Art und Weise.
description.french: Bats un adversaire coriace d'une façon inattendue.
description.italian: Sconfiggi un avversario impegnativo in un modo inaspettato
description.koreana: 예상치 못한 방법으로 강력한 적을 쓰러뜨린다
description.spanish: Derrota a un rival robusto de un modo inesperado
description.schinese: 出其不意地击败顽固的敌人
description.tchinese: 出其不意地擊敗頑固的敵人
description.russian: Победить мощного врага необычным образом
description.japanese: 思いがけない方法で強固な敵を倒す
description.dutch: Versla een lastige tegenstander op een onverwachte manier
description.arabic: اهزم خصمًا قويًا بطريقة غير متوقعة
description.brazilian: Derrote um forte adversário de uma forma inesperada

description.english: Use an enemy's minion against him
description.german: Verwende den Diener eines Widersachers gegen ihn.
description.french: Utilise un sbire contre son chef.
description.italian: Usa il seguace di un nemico contro di lui
description.spanish: Usa al esbirro de un enemigo en su contra
description.schinese: 用对手的手下来对付它
description.tchinese: 用對手的手下來對付它
description.russian: Использовать приспешника врага против него самого
description.japanese: 敵の手下を出した本人にけしかける
description.dutch: Gebruik het hulpje van een vijand tegen hem
description.brazilian: Use o servo de um inimigo contra ele

displayName.japanese: パンプキン・スマッシュ

description.english: Lead an adversary to his own undoing
description.german: Führe einen Widersacher in sein Verderben.
description.french: Mène un adversaire à sa déroute.
description.italian: Spingi un avversario a causare la sua stessa fine
description.spanish: Lleva a un adversario a su propia perdición
description.schinese: 引诱一个敌人自取灭亡
description.tchinese: 引誘一個敵人自取滅亡
description.russian: Привести врага к самоуничтожению
description.japanese: 強敵を自ら破滅させる
description.dutch: Leid een tegenstander naar zijn eigen ondergang
description.brazilian: Faça com que um adversário cause a própria derrota

description.english: Clear Speedrun mode on Normal within 45 minutes
description.german: Schließe den Tempolauf auf "Normal" innerhalb von 45 Minuten ab.
description.french: Termine le mode Sprint en Normal en moins de 45 minutes.
description.italian: Completa la modalità Prova a tempo a livello Normale entro 45 minuti
description.koreana: 보통 난이도로 스피드런 모드를 45분 안에 끝낸다
description.spanish: Supera el modo Velocidad en dificultad Normal en 45 minutos o menos
description.schinese: 在45分钟内通关普通难度疾速模式
description.tchinese: 在45分鐘內通關普通難度疾速模式
description.russian: Завершить прохождение на скорость на обычном уровне сложности за 45 минут
description.japanese: ノーマルモードのスピードランを45分以内にクリア
description.dutch: Voltooi een Snelheidsrace op Normaal binnen 45 minuten
description.arabic: أنه وضع الركض السريع في المستوى العادي في غضون 45 دقيقة
description.brazilian: Conclua a Prova de Tempo no nível Normal em menos de 45 minutos
